original: @#/_/rdo rje gtum po'i nas phyir bzlog
analyzed: @#/_/rdo rje gtum po'i nas phyir bzlog
translated: Vajra Wrathful One's Repelling

original: pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/🔽hu🔽rag gtum po'i phyir bzlog bzhugs so//_@##/_/khungs btshun rgya gar🔽skad du/_mtshhan sbyar badzra tshan d+ha na rkan po tshakra na ma/_lo tsha ba'i drin bod skad du/_rdo
analyzed: pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ hu rag gtum po'i phyir bzlog bzhugs so//_@##/_/khungs btshun rgya gar skad du/_mtshhan sbyar badzra tshan d+ha na rkan po tshakra na ma/_lo tsha ba'i drin bod skad du/_rdo
translated: The Wheel of Repelling with Vajra Caṇḍa🔽In Sanskrit: Vajra-caṇḍa-mahāroṣaṇa-cakra-nāma🔽In Tibetan: The Wheel of Repelling through Vajra Caṇḍa

original: rje gtum po'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_mchod brjod dpal phyag
analyzed: rje gtum po'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_mchod brjod dpal phyag
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajra Caṇḍa.🔽Ru means rākṣasa, ni means nāga, and mu means māra.

original: na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/ru dang ni klu dang bdud dang /_/_tri ni gshin rje
analyzed: na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/ru dang ni klu dang bdud dang /_/_tri ni gshin rje
translated: Tri means Yama,

original: dang /_ma /_na ma mo dang /_ka tri ni mgon po ha dri zer dang /_tri tri ni rgyal po dang /_lar
analyzed: dang /_ma /_na ma mo dang /_ka tri ni mgon po ha dri zer dang /_tri tri ni rgyal po dang /_lar
translated: ma means mātṛkā, ka-tri means Maheśvara,🔽ha means gandharva, and tri-tri means rākṣasa.🔽La means yakṣa,

original: tri ni gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma srin sde brgyad tsha tri ni btshan dang /_de la sogs pa'i phas kyi
analyzed: tri ni gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma srin sde brgyad tsha tri ni btshan dang /_de la sogs pa'i phas kyi
translated: and aṣṭa means the eight classes of gods and rākṣasas.🔽All such harmful enemies, evil mantras,

original: gnod pa ngan sngags dang /_rbod gtong dang /_bsam sbyor ngan pa thams cad
analyzed: gnod pa ngan sngags dang /_rbod gtong dang /_bsam sbyor ngan pa thams cad
translated: harmful spells, and evil intentions

original: dang /_bdag la gnod pa'i gzugs thams cad shog bu'am ro ras la yan lag
analyzed: dang /_bdag la gnod pa'i gzugs thams cad shog bu'am ro ras la yan lag
translated: Draw all the forms that harm you on paper or cloth,

original: drug la 'khor lo rtshibs drug pa bzhin bri/_de'i kha nas lce phyir drangs la 'khor
analyzed: drug la 'khor lo rtshibs drug pa bzhin bri/_de'i kha nas lce phyir drangs la 'khor
translated: and draw the six limbs and six spokes of the wheel on the tongue.

original: lo'i lte bar lce'i stengs su ling ka'i khar rmi lam du gang rdo rje rgya gram lce dkyil du bri/
analyzed: lo'i lte bar lce'i stengs su ling ka'i khar rmi lam du gang rdo rje rgya gram lce dkyil du bri/
translated: Draw the vajra cross in the center of the tongue,

original: de'i lte bar/_lus ngag yid ka ya bka tshi ta/_gnan pa ste ba ya nan dza zhes pa na sha
analyzed: de'i lte bar/_lus ngag yid ka ya bka tshi ta/_gnan pa ste ba ya nan dza zhes pa na sha
translated: and in the center of that, write “the body, speech, and mind of so-and-so.”🔽Write “naśa ya” and “naśa ya” on the two sides.🔽Write the name and lineage of the person.

original: ya gzir bri/_gang gi ming rus kyang bri/_de la dgug gzhug bya/_gu gul la
analyzed: ya gzir bri/_gang gi ming rus kyang bri/_de la dgug gzhug bya/_gu gul la
translated: Summon and absorb.🔽Smoke with the eight inauspicious substances such as gugul,

original: sogs mi mthun pa'i rdzas brgyad kyi dud pas gdugs/_lha dang dbye/_rang
analyzed: sogs mi mthun pa'i rdzas brgyad kyi dud pas gdugs/_lha dang dbye/_rang
translated: separate from the deity,🔽and enter into the concentration of the deity of fierce vajra.

original: nyid rdo rje gtum pa'i lha'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/_khro bo bcu yi phyogs bcu nas
analyzed: nyid rdo rje gtum pa'i lha'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/_khro bo bcu yi phyogs bcu nas
translated: Summon the ten wrathful ones from the ten directions,🔽and dissolve them into the effigy.

original: don _po bkug la ling ka la stims te/_sngags 'di lan gsum gyi/_sprul pa o
analyzed: don _po bkug la ling ka la stims te/_sngags 'di lan gsum gyi/_sprul pa o
translated: Recite this mantra three times:🔽“The emanations oṃ

original: rdo rje khro bo bcus gnas nas dgug pa badzra kro ta sarba sha ga_rdza/_ha na ha ha/_pa
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo bcus gnas nas dgug pa badzra kro ta sarba sha ga_rdza/_ha na ha ha/_pa
translated: The ten wrathful vajras summon from their abodes: vajra krodha sarva sha ghrāṃ hana hana hā hā🔽paca pacha dāha dāha tāpa tāpa bandha bandha hu lu ti stana

original: tsha ban d+ha/_hu lu ti sa sta/_tshhin d+ha bin d+ha/_spo ta ya hu~m phat/
analyzed: tsha ban d+ha/_hu lu ti sa sta/_tshhin d+ha bin d+ha/_spo ta ya hu~m phat/
translated: chhin dha vin dha sphoṭaya hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Emanate with those.🔽Hook: oṃ vajra aṅkuśa jaḥ🔽noose: vajra pāśa hūṃ🔽fetters: vajra sphoṭa vaṃ

original: ces pas spros la/_lcags kyu o badzra a gu sha dza/_zhags pa badzra pa sha hum/_lcags sgrog🔽badzra spo ta bam/_dril bu badzra pa sha ho/_ces pas dgug_/gzhug cing dbang
analyzed: ces pas spros la/_lcags kyu o badzra a gu sha dza/_zhags pa badzra pa sha hum/_lcags sgrog badzra spo ta bam/_dril bu badzra pa sha ho/_ces pas dgug_/gzhug cing dbang
translated: bell: vajra ghaṇḍe hoḥ.🔽Summon with those.

original: du bya/_de nas phur pa gnas lngar gdab pa ni/_stod khro bo gtum po la smad phur
analyzed: du bya/_de nas phur pa gnas lngar gdab pa ni/_stod khro bo gtum po la smad phur
translated: Then, the dagger is inserted into the five places: The upper part is wrathful Caṇḍa, and the lower part is the sharp point of the dagger.🔽Generate the red-tipped dagger like the tip of a spear.

original: pa'i dbal so mal dmar po nas brton ma thog lta bur bskyed la/_sngags 'dis
analyzed: pa'i dbal so mal dmar po nas brton ma thog lta bur bskyed la/_sngags 'dis
translated: Insert with this mantra:

original: gdab/_rtsha sngags om badzra tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hum/_dgra bgegs a mu ka phye shi kr-i
analyzed: gdab/_rtsha sngags om badzra tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hum/_dgra bgegs a mu ka phye shi kr-i
translated: oṃ vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ🔽enemies and obstructors amuka chhedi kīlī kīlaya taṃ paca hūṃ phaṭ

original: ki la ya tam pa hu~m phat dpral bar brdab/_pa tam tsha pa ya ki la ya hu~m phat mgrin par gdab/
analyzed: ki la ya tam pa hu~m phat dpral bar brdab/_pa tam tsha pa ya ki la ya hu~m phat mgrin par gdab/
translated: tapaca pāya kīlaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: mu ka sto pa ya ki la ya hum snying gar gdab/_ka ti sti pa ya ki la ya hu~m phat lte bar gdab/
analyzed: mu ka sto pa ya ki la ya hum snying gar gdab/_ka ti sti pa ya ki la ya hu~m phat lte bar gdab/
translated: For the dagger stabs, say: “Muka stipa yaka kila ya hūṃ” and stab the heart. “ Ka ti stipa yaka kila ya hūṃ phaṭ” and stab the navel.

original: hri dang rtogs pa ya ki la ya hu~m phat gsang bar gdab/_ces pas _phur pa gdab/🔽lcags kyi 'khor lo dang /_zangs tshakra dang /_dngul tshakra dang /_gser gyi
analyzed: hri dang rtogs pa ya ki la ya hu~m phat gsang bar gdab/_ces pas _phur pa gdab/ lcags kyi 'khor lo dang /_zangs tshakra dang /_dngul tshakra dang /_gser gyi
translated: “ Hrīḥ and rtogs pa yaka kila ya hūṃ phaṭ” and stab the secret place.🔽Imagine that the four wheels—the iron wheel, copper wheel, silver wheel, and golden wheel—are below and above the tongue.

original: 'khor los tshakra bzhi lce'i 'og dang steng du gnan par tshakra bzhi bsam la/_rin po che lngar
analyzed: 'khor los tshakra bzhi lce'i 'og dang steng du gnan par tshakra bzhi bsam la/_rin po che lngar
translated: “ The five precious substances”

original: 'khor lo o rat+na pan tsha lus tshakra ka ya sti pa nan/_ngag bag sto pa nan/_yid tshi ta rtogs pa
analyzed: 'khor lo o rat+na pan tsha lus tshakra ka ya sti pa nan/_ngag bag sto pa nan/_yid tshi ta rtogs pa
translated: “The wheel” “o ratna pañca lu” “The body wheel” “kāya stipa nan” “Speech” “mukha stipa nan” “Mind” “tshi ta rtogs pa nan”

original: nan zhes brjod la/_gnan te lcar la steng 'og bar du gdab par bsam/_/drag
analyzed: nan zhes brjod la/_gnan te lcar la steng 'og bar du gdab par bsam/_/drag
translated: Say that and press down. Imagine that the wheels are above, below, and in between the tongue.

original: sngags kyis gzir gnan drag tu byas la/_hu~m hu~m hri la hri bsgrub pa spyi dril gyi lnga sngags
analyzed: sngags kyis gzir gnan drag tu byas la/_hu~m hu~m hri la hri bsgrub pa spyi dril gyi lnga sngags
translated: “ The fierce mantra” “Press down” “Fierce” “Hūṃ hūṃ hrīḥ la hrīḥ” “The mantra of the general gathering of the sādhana”

analyzed: bzlas nyungs dkar khrag dug la thun brdeg_/de gan skyal du dong gru gsum du ling ka

original: gzhug_/gnas lnga gsang ba la sogs pa lnga dang /_dkyil du smra byed kyi phur pa gdab/
analyzed: gzhug_/gnas lnga gsang ba la sogs pa lnga dang /_dkyil du smra byed kyi phur pa gdab/
translated: the stake of speech.

original: rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/
analyzed: rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/
translated: The Wheel of Repelling through the Door of Vajra Caṇḍālī🔽On top of that, draw a vajra cross and the four continents with Mount

original: de'i khar ro g.yam la mtshhal chen gyis rdo rje rgya gram dang /_gling bzhi ri rab
analyzed: de'i khar ro g.yam la mtshhal chen gyis rdo rje rgya gram dang /_gling bzhi ri rab
translated: Meru with great charnel ground ash on a stone slab, and cover it.🔽Place it under your bed, on your pillow, or wherever you like, and

original: dang bcas pa bris la kha bcad/_rang gi mal 'og gam/_rngas kha 'am gnan pa
analyzed: dang bcas pa bris la kha bcad/_rang gi mal 'og gam/_rngas kha 'am gnan pa
translated: press down.

original: gang rung du gang rung bar gnan la/_de nas nang nub dang /_dus gnyan la
analyzed: gang rung du gang rung bar gnan la/_de nas nang nub dang /_dus gnyan la
translated: Then, in the morning and evening and at critical times,🔽recite this mantra and visualize it.

original: sngags 'di bzlas te brgya rtsha brgyad dam nyer gcig tsham bzlas la dmigs pa de
analyzed: sngags 'di bzlas te brgya rtsha brgyad dam nyer gcig tsham bzlas la dmigs pa de
translated: Recite it one hundred and eight or twenty-one times.🔽Om vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ phaṭ

original: la gzung /_om badzra tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hum phat/_ki la ya hu~m b+ha t+ta ya/_b+ha
analyzed: la gzung /_om badzra tshan d+ha ma ha ro sha na hum phat/_ki la ya hu~m b+ha t+ta ya/_b+ha
translated: Kīlaya hūṃ bhasta ya🔽bhasaya🔽logarupa🔽bhataya hūṃ phaṭ🔽mantra of repelling

original: sa ya/_lo ga ru pa/_b+ha tha ya hum phat bzlog pa'i sngags/_pra tang ki ra rbadgtong
analyzed: sa ya/_lo ga ru pa/_b+ha tha ya hum phat bzlog pa'i sngags/_pra tang ki ra rbadgtong
translated: pratyangira

original: /_bzlog bzlog_/nang nub nyi shu rtsha re dang /_dus la brgya rtsha brgyad
analyzed: /_bzlog bzlog_/nang nub nyi shu rtsha re dang /_dus la brgya rtsha brgyad
translated: “Stop! Stop! ” twenty times in the morning and evening, and one hundred and eight times at the appointed time.🔽 If one is going to another place, add that on top of that.

original: du bzlas/_bdag gzhan du 'gro na de'i steng du lhan cig bzhag_/bri thabs
analyzed: du bzlas/_bdag gzhan du 'gro na de'i steng du lhan cig bzhag_/bri thabs
translated: Ask about the method of writing.

original: zhal du dris/_kho'i 'gro ba'i yul lha de'i pho lha mi dga' na/_kho'i yul lha rten nam
analyzed: zhal du dris/_kho'i 'gro ba'i yul lha de'i pho lha mi dga' na/_kho'i yul lha rten nam
translated: If the male deity of the deity of the place where he is going is displeased, then from the deity of his place,

original: rig mtho ba nas/_rdo dkar po blangs la/_mchod rdzas 'brang rgyas dang / gsang lug dang /_bshos bu mkhar thabs la sogs pa'i chang phud dang bcas pas mchod
analyzed: rig mtho ba nas/_rdo dkar po blangs la/_mchod rdzas 'brang rgyas dang / gsang lug dang /_bshos bu mkhar thabs la sogs pa'i chang phud dang bcas pas mchod
translated: take a white stone, and with the offering substances of a torma, a secret sheep, a pyramid-shaped rice cake, and so on, together with the first portion of the beer, make offerings

original: la/_bden pa brdar ro/_/dpal rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas dngos su bya ba dang ting nge
analyzed: la/_bden pa brdar ro/_/dpal rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas dngos su bya ba dang ting nge
translated: and recite the truth.

original: 'dzin gyi bya ba rnam pa gnyis so rbod gtong phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo/_slob dpon las kyi
analyzed: 'dzin gyi bya ba rnam pa gnyis so rbod gtong phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo/_slob dpon las kyi
translated: There are two things to do in the presence of glorious Vajra Heruka: the actions of meditative concentration and the actions of the deity.

original: rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The wheel of reversing the dispatched killing is complete.🔽  It was composed by the master Karmavajra.

original: rgya gar mu stegs pa'i mthu bzlog pa'i don du mdzad pa'o gsung /_bla ma
analyzed: rgya gar mu stegs pa'i mthu bzlog pa'i don du mdzad pa'o gsung /_bla ma
translated: It is said to have been composed for the purpose of countering the power of the Indian tīrthikas.

original: wa la tshan dras/_rje ras chung pa la gnang ba'o/_/mgo dang /_gshen dang / ras pa dang /_su ga badzra bdag las brgyud gsung ngo /_/'di lag len cig
analyzed: wa la tshan dras/_rje ras chung pa la gnang ba'o/_/mgo dang /_gshen dang / ras pa dang /_su ga badzra bdag las brgyud gsung ngo /_/'di lag len cig
translated: The lineage of this is that it was given to the lord Rechungpa, and it is said that it was transmitted from him to Go, Shönu, Repa, and Sugatavajra.

original: yod sem mo//_byed_//
analyzed: yod sem mo//_byed_//
translated: I think there is a practice for this.

original: gyi 'dra pags pa
analyzed: gyi 'dra pags pa
translated: The skin of a jackal

original: om badzra sarba sto na e/_trig nan/_hur thums dza/_ma ra ya rbad//_//
analyzed: om badzra sarba sto na e/_trig nan/_hur thums dza/_ma ra ya rbad//_//
translated: Oṃ vajra sarva stona e triṃnaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/
analyzed: rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/
translated: The Wheel of Repelling through the Practice of Vajra Heruka
